summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ArtChain digital art ownership platform. Backend APIs are fully functional with 100% success rate. Frontend pages load correctly with proper dark theme implementation. Authentication system works but has session persistence issues.

integration_issues.issue: User session not persisting after login - redirects back to login page when accessing /dashboard directly

passed_tests: Landing page loads with dark theme and all components
Gallery page displays artworks correctly with search/filter functionality
Login page authentication works (user can log in successfully)
Marketplace page loads and displays correctly
Admin page access control works (redirects to login)
Artwork detail pages load and display purchase buttons
Dark theme implementation is consistent across all pages
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix session persistence issue in AuthContext - user authentication works but sessions don't persist when navigating directly to protected routes like /dashboard. This may be related to JWT token storage or validation in the frontend.
